yaml.title: Office House Schedule
yaml.summary: Schedule of the Gov 50 Office Hours.

markdown.markdown:
```{r packages-data, include=FALSE} 
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)

schedule <- read_csv("../data/office-hours.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) 
```
 
```{r build-table, echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
tbl <- schedule |>
  kbl(escap = FALSE, align = "llll", table.attr = 'class="schedule-table"') |>
  kable_styling() |>
  column_spec(1:3, width = "20%", extra_css = "padding-right: 20px;") |>  
  column_spec(4, width = "60%")

  cat(tbl)
```

instructor.name: Prof. Seung-Ho An
instructor.contact_policy: We will have a team chat on "Teams." If you have any questions, feel free to send me an email. I normally try to answer within 24 hours. If you don't hear from me in 48 hours, please feel free to send me a reminder.
